Schema
===============

qr_code_key
-------------
.. code-block:: console
    
    qr_code_key = Column(String, primary_key = True)

This is the qr_code_key generated by our web application which is used as the primary key.

experiment_id
-----------------
.. code-block:: console
    
    experiment_id = Column(String, nullable = False)

This is the experiment id of the sample.

storage_condition
--------------------
.. code-block:: console
    
    storage_condition = Column(String, nullable = False)

This is the storage condition that the sample is current placed in, such as temperature.

contents
------------
.. code-block:: console
    
    contents = Column(String, nullable = False)

This is the contents of the sample.

analyst
---------
.. code-block:: console
    
    analyst = Column(String, nullable = False)

This is the abbreviation of the name of the analyst who was responsible in preparing the sample.

date_entered
---------------
.. code-block:: console
    
    date_entered = Column(Date, nullable = False)

Date that the sample was entered. If not provided the program would default this as the time it is entered to the database.

date_modified
---------------
.. code-block:: console
    
    date_modified = Column(Date, nullable = False)

Date that the sample was modified. If it was not updated date_modified would be the same as date_entered.

expiration_date
---------------
.. code-block:: console
    
    expiration_date = Column(Date, nullable = False)

Date that the sample expires.
